name: Kaz
description:
When a creature dies, what becomes of its body? It returns to the earth, to the roots. But what happens when corruption taints these roots? In this multi-level puzzle platformer, play as Kaz as they attempt to cleanse this corruption. Find your way to the cleansing podium at the end of each level, and solve the puzzle to purify the forest's roots.

Game Writer: Sable Jones  

Game Programmers: Nico Brault and Sammi Jones  

Character Art and UI Elements: Sable Jones

 Environment Art: Sammi Jones 

Music Score: Nick Brault
